subject: Soccer
organizations: New York City Football Club (Soccer Team)
lead_paragraph: The New York City Football Club introduced Claudio Reyna, who played for the United States national team in four World Cups, as its first director of football operations on Wednesday.
snippet: The New York City Football Club introduced Claudio Reyna, who played for the United States national team in four World Cups, as its first director of football operations on Wednesday.
